issue.title: Fix throw not being respected on Malformed URL

repository.name: k6
repository.description: A modern load testing tool, using Go and JavaScript

license.name: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

issue.body:
Closes #1502

Notes:
* Not sure if the verification should happen on `Request()`
* The way `throw` is disabled on the test feels clunky, it might be a better approach
